metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18196 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Leptonica 1.74.4 constructs unintended pathnames (containing duplicated path components) when operating on files in /tmp subdirectories, which might allow local users to bypass intended file restrictions by leveraging access to a directory located deeper within the /tmp directory tree, as demonstrated by /tmp/ANY/PATH/ANY/PATH/input.tif. It was discovered that Leptonica incorrectly handled path names. An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: leptonlib package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.75.3-2').
